import React from 'react'; import { Camera, Heart } from 'lucide-react'; import { Card, CardContent } from '../components/ui/card'; const About = () => { return (
{/* Header */}

About Us

Meet Pieter & Allische Horn – Your Hosts in Namaqualand

{/* Main Content */}

Pieter & Allische Horn
Your Dedicated Hosts

Our Story

De Riet Off-Grid Campsite is proudly run by Pieter and Allische Horn, a dedicated married couple deeply rooted in the Northern Cape's wild landscapes. With years of exploring Namaqualand's remote trails, beaches, and flower fields, they've created this off-grid haven to share the region's untouched beauty with fellow nature lovers.

Pieter Horn

Pieter handles the practical side: designing sustainable, low-impact facilities that harmonize with the environment while ensuring smooth off-grid operations – from water systems to site maintenance. His intimate knowledge of the area helps guests find the best wildlife spots, hiking paths, and seasonal highlights.

Allische Horn

Allische adds the artistic touch as an amateur photographer with a remarkable eye for nature's details. She captures the subtle wonders of Namaqualand – tiny flower petals, antelope silhouettes at dawn, starry nights over tents, and intricate reptile patterns – many featured in our gallery. Her images inspire visitors to appreciate the minute beauty of this semi-desert paradise.

{/* Philosophy Section */}

Our Philosophy

Eco-Friendly

We prioritize sustainable, low-impact camping that respects the fragile Namaqualand ecosystem

Personal Service

Living on-site, we're always available for tips, braai chats, or assistance

Passion for Nature

We've loved this land forever and are excited to share its magic with you

{/* Quote */}
"We've loved this land forever – now we're excited to welcome you to experience its magic firsthand."

— Pieter & Allische Horn
{/* Additional Info */}

Local Expertise

Years of exploring Namaqualand have given us deep insights into the best times to visit, hidden gems to discover, and how to make the most of your off-grid experience. We know where the Springbok graze, when the flowers bloom brightest, and which sunset spots take your breath away.

Community Connection

We're proud members of the Koingnaas community and work closely with local guides for tours and activities. Our connections help us arrange shipwreck tours, beach excursions, fishing trips, and geology hikes that showcase the best of the Northern Cape's west coast.
